name: Doll Dress Up: Sweet Girl
description:
Doll Dress Up: Sweet Girl creates a very serene and beautiful environment for you to design your dolls!

You are free to alter them in many ways! Make chic, adorable, or even pastel chibi dolls! Be a doll designer and let your creativity soar! Dress up your doll in your own unique way, make your own anime character, select your ideal clothing, accessorize with the coolest face and bring your beautiful dolls to life!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Click to makeover with your finger
- Put on suitable cosmetics
- Dress up in a variety of clothing and items
- Arrange the scenario
- Create an unique photographic memory

FEATURE:
- Click to makeover
- Freedom of clothing
- A variety of background themes
- Large selection of dress-up items
- Keep track of every innovative designs

Now, are you ready to create your own characters in Doll Dress Up: Sweet Girl?
